title: Grasping the Power of Forgiveness, Part 2
itunes:author: Guests: Al & Lisa Robertson
itunes:summary: You might fear being open up with your spouse about past regrets. But, honesty can be the door that opens your marriage up to greater intimacy. Greg and John offer helpful ideas for discussing your past mistakes in a healthy way. Receive the book Desperate Forgiveness with your gift of any amount.
